name: Strikecraft
desc:
This vehicle depends on larger ships for support, maintenance, and long-range travel.

It's relatively small size allow it to %s, but %s. Additionally, the unit's smaller engines yield %s.

Combat readiness decays %s faster than normal ships. Can return to friendly carriers to refit, recovering %s CR and replenishing armor, hull, and ammo by %s. Refit time increases based on the total amount of damage the craft has taken, the type of weapons equipped, and the refit rate of the chosen carrier.

The refit process, especially unassisted by any natively installed LPCs for replacement parts, cuts directly into the carriers ability to service its other craft; the servicing fighter bay's replacement rate will be decreased by %s.

In terms of skill-based modifiers, receives the same benefits of a frigate. Attacks on this craft from captains with the %s skill receive the full damage bonus that would affect other fighters.

name: Booster Unit
desc:
The Torment has an auxiliary reactor that grants an additional shield, but can be attacked and destroyed during combat, which shuts down the secondary shield and reduces flux dissipation and capacity by %s percent.

The secondary shield has %s capacity, %s dissipation and has a %s efficiency.

The reactor and its shield are affected by the Torment captain's skills, but not by any hullmods applied to the Torment itself.
short: Severe reduction in combat capability if generator is destroyed.

name: Cataphract LSM
desc: Cataphract-class mechs are durable machines with reinforced internals and triple redundant systems - they're %s more resistant to EMP effects while weapons and engines are %s less likely to fail. Finally, these units are capable of deploying to support planetary operations, increasing their effective strength by %s, (up to the total number of marines in the fleet), at the cost of %s combat readiness.

name: Anti-Beam Coat
desc:
Obsolete defensive measure against beam weaponry.

Several layers of this semi-transparent coating protect from beam weapons by reflecting certain wavelengths of light, effectively reducing beam damage by %s.

While the Phase Damper Field is active, effect is augmented to provide a %s reduction.

name: Wing Commander
desc:
This craft is outfitted with a suite of additional sensors and enhanced communication capabilities designed to coordinate the manuevers of a squadron of strikecraft under it's direct command.

Compact comm systems are not as effective as those housed on larger vessels, reducing fighter engagement range by %s. 

If necessary, %s. Should any be shot down in combat, %s to reinforce the squadron.

The most capable pilots in the fleet are chosen to fly under these squadrons: Strikecraft piloted by these personnel have %s greater reaction time than the norm.

%s cannot be assigned to pilots of the wing.
